parameters.name: Bandwidth
parameters.description:
The bandwidth of the Express Connect circuit. Unit: Mbit/s.

Valid values: **2** to **10240**.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description:
The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests.

>  If you do not specify this parameter, the system automatically uses the request ID as the client token. The request ID may be different for each request.

parameters.name: CompanyName
parameters.description: The name of the customer company that requires the Express Connect circuit.

parameters.name: ConstructionTime
parameters.description: The time when construction started. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ format. The time is displayed in UTC.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the Express Connect circuit.

parameters.name: LineType
parameters.description:
The type of Express Connect circuit. Valid values:

*   **MSTP**
*   **MPLSVPN**
*   **FIBRE**
*   **Other**

parameters.name: PMInfo
parameters.description: The information about the construction engineer.

parameters.name: PeerLocation
parameters.description: The geographic location where the Express Connect circuit is deployed.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region where the Express Connect circuit is deployed. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
